purpose: Provide examples and guidance for using foundational models with Amazon Bedrock Service
principle: Demonstrates the use of various foundational models in Amazon Bedrock, including Amazon Titan, by providing sample code and Jupyter Notebooks
reusability: Sample code and notebooks can be adapted for custom use cases, providing a starting point for integrating Amazon Bedrock models
limitations: Examples are limited to the foundational models available in Amazon Bedrock; requires AWS account and setup
name: amazon-bedrock-samples
description: This repository contains examples for customers to get started using the Amazon Bedrock Service. This contains examples for all available foundational models
